hero.title: General Data Annotation Services
hero.subtitle: Enterprise-scale data annotation powered by our 1,000-strong team in Namibia. Cost-effective, high-quality annotation for all data types.

overview.title: Data Annotation & Processing Services
overview.subtitle: We provide a comprehensive range of data services to meet your specific needs.

text.title: Text Annotation
text.description: Converting text into structured, machine-readable formats through recognition, transcription, and qualification.

image.title: Image Annotation
image.description: Adding metadata to images through tagging, labeling, segmentation and object recognition.

video.title: Video Annotation
video.description: Enhancing video content with metadata through transcription and sequential labeling.

audio.title: Audio Annotation
audio.description: Converting audio to text and analyzing tone through speech recognition and sentiment analysis.

processing.title: Data Processing
processing.description: Transforming raw data into useful formats through entry, validation, cleansing, and migration.

textAnnotation.title: Text Annotation Services
textAnnotation.subtitle: Converting printed or spoken language into structured, machine-readable formats.

recognition.name: Character recognition
recognition.description: Converting printed or handwritten characters into machine-encoded text

transcription.name: Transcription
transcription.description: Converting spoken language into written text

qualification.name: Article qualification
qualification.description: Classifying or scoring articles based on predefined criteria or relevance

moderation.name: Content moderation
moderation.description: Reviewing and filtering content to ensure compliance with guidelines or policies

imageAnnotation.title: Image Annotation Services
imageAnnotation.subtitle: Adding metadata to images to make them recognizable and processable by machine learning systems.

annotation.name: Image annotation
annotation.description: Tagging objects, attributes, or areas within images for machine learning

labeling.name: Image labelling
labeling.description: Assigning labels or categories to whole images

recognition.name: Shape recognition
recognition.description: Identifying and tagging geometric shapes or object outlines in images

segmentation.name: Image segmentation
segmentation.description: Pixel-level annotation dividing an image into meaningful parts or regions

videoAnnotation.title: Video Annotation Services
videoAnnotation.subtitle: Enhancing video content with metadata for better analysis and understanding.

transcription.name: Transcription
transcription.description: Converting video audio into written text

sequencing.name: Sequencing
sequencing.description: Labelling or ordering actions, events, or scenes over time in video

audioAnnotation.title: Audio Annotation Services
audioAnnotation.subtitle: Converting audio content to structured formats and analyzing tone for better insights.

speechToText.name: Speech-to-text
speechToText.description: Automatically or manually converting spoken words into text format

sentiment.name: Sentiment analysis
sentiment.description: Classifying text or audio based on emotional tone (positive, negative, neutral)

dataProcessing.title: Data Processing Services
dataProcessing.subtitle: Transforming raw data into clean, structured, and usable formats for better decision-making.

entry.title: Data Entry
entry.subtitle: Data Entry Tasks
entry.description: We manually or automatically input, update, or maintain data in a digital format — usually into databases, spreadsheets, CRMs, or other software systems.

tasks.typing: Typing handwritten information in a spreadsheet
tasks.transferring: Transferring data from PDFs or scans into a database
tasks.inputting: Inputting survey responses or invoices into a system
tasks.migration: Transferring data from one system to another (e.g., Excel to Jira)

validation.title: Data Validation
validation.subtitle: Data Validation Tasks
validation.description: We ensure that the data collected, entered, or processed is correct, usable, and meaningful — whether it comes from humans or machines.

tasks.format: Format checks: Make sure the data is of the correct format
tasks.range: Range checks: Make sure the data is within its determined limits
tasks.consistency: Consistency checks: Make sure the data points are aligned semantically and structurally
tasks.completeness: Completeness checks: Make sure that all required fields are present

cleansing.title: Data Cleansing
cleansing.subtitle: Data Cleansing Tasks
cleansing.description: Our teams' work improves the quality, reliability, and usability of data by correcting or removing inaccurate, incomplete, duplicated, or irrelevant data within a dataset.

tasks.duplicates: Removing duplicates: Make sure an entry doesn't appear twice in a dataset
tasks.typos: Fixing typos: Make sure typos are fixed and noise is removed from the data
tasks.standardizing: Standardizing data: Make sure the data uses the same format and unit measures
tasks.outliers: Eliminating outliers or errors: Remove unusable and incorrect data

migration.title: Data Migration
migration.subtitle: Data Migration Process
migration.description: Data migration is the process of moving data between systems (computing environments, storage system or format) while preserving data integrity and ensuring compatibility with the destination system.

tasks.extract: Extract data from the source system
tasks.transform: Transform data into the format of the new system
tasks.entering: Entering the data into the new system
tasks.testing: Testing the data integrity in the new system

customSolutions.title: Custom Solutions
customSolutions.subtitle: Don't see exactly what you need? We can help.
customSolutions.paragraph1: Every business has unique data challenges. Our team can work with you to develop custom data annotation and processing solutions tailored to your specific requirements.
customSolutions.paragraph2: Whether you need a combination of services, specialized domain expertise, or a completely unique workflow, we can design a solution that meets your needs.

cta.title: Ready to transform your data?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today to discuss your data annotation and processing needs and get a customized quote.
